name: Strike Force Heroes 2
summary: Customize 5 unique soldiers with hundreds of weapons, attachments, armour upgrades and camouflages. Play the campaign for an action packed continuation of the Strike Force Heroes storyline or try your luck at the new slot machine to win rare weapons and hop into a custom game.
info:
• 中文名: 战火英雄2
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: TPS ACT
